message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept this and we can end the game early.
I'll give you a smaller share this round, but I'm still willing to negotiate a good deal for myself.
I'll give you a slightly larger share this round, but I'm not willing to give up more than 45. Meet me in the middle?
I'll take a larger share this round, but I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share than before. Don't expect any more generosity from me!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a slightly larger share to make it worth my while. Can you meet me at 42?
I'm not getting any younger, Alice. I want a bigger share now. Take it or leave it!
I'm getting desperate, Bob. I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I need something closer to 40 to make it worth my while. Can we meet in the middle?
I'm not budging, Alice. You're running out of time. This is my final offer.
I'm willing to accept a 40-60 split, but only if you agree to accept it now. I don't want to go any lower.
